item.title: 西班牙 Mapfre 公司今年前九个月利润飙升近 40
item.description: 西班牙最大的保险公司 Mapfre 周二表示，今年前九个月的净利润增长了 39%，原因是价格上涨、天气转好以及自然灾害减少提升了非寿险业务的盈利能力。【原文：Spain's largest insurer Mapfre said on Tuesday its net profit rose 39% in first nine months of the year as higher prices and a more benign weather and less severe natural disasters lifted its non-life business' profitability.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）欧洲区总裁表示，德国需要改革和投资来克服经济衰退
item.description: 国际货币基金组织欧洲区总裁在接受《南德意志报》采访时表示，德国需要进行结构性改革，并加大对公共基础设施的投资，以克服经济衰退。【原文：Germany needs both structural reforms and more investment in public infrastructure to overcome recession, the European head of the International Monetary Fund said in an interview with Sueddeutsche Zeitung.】

item.title: 石油需求下滑，英国石油公司第三季度利润降至 23 亿美元
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）周二公布，第三季度利润为 23 亿美元，高于预期，为近四年来最低，受炼油利润下降和石油交易疲软的影响。【原文：BP on Tuesday reported higher-than-expected third quarter profits of $2.3 billion, their lowest in almost four years, weighed down by a drop in refining profits and weaker oil trading.】

item.title: 调查发现德国有更多公司计划涨价
item.description: 周二公布的一项调查显示，德国工业、零售业和企业服务业的公司正计划提高价格，从而使通胀率有望升至欧洲央行设定的 2% 的目标。【原文：Companies in Germany's industrial, retail and corporate services sectors are planning more price increases, bringing inflation on track to rise to the European Central Bank's 2% target, according to a survey published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯第一大股东减持股份至 3.51
item.description: 阿迪达斯在周二提交的文件中宣布，阿迪达斯的大股东布鲁塞尔兰伯特集团已将其在这家德国体育用品公司的持股比例降至 3.51%。【原文：Top Adidas shareholder Groupe Bruxelles Lambert has cut its stake in the German sportswear company to 3.51%, Adidas announced in filings on Tuesday.】

item.title: GfK 发现，11 月德国消费者信心稳步回升
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，德国消费者情绪将在进入11月后继续回升，因为家庭对收入前景更加乐观，尽管高物价和糟糕的就业市场消息正在冲淡这些积极因素。【原文：German consumer sentiment is set to continue to recover heading into November as households are more optimistic about their income prospects, though high prices and bad job market news are diluting those positive factors, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯第三季度在华销售额增长
item.description: 阿迪达斯周二表示，第三季度在大中华区实现了强劲的基本增长，而北美地区（不包括 Yeezy 系列）的销售额也因品牌增长势头而实现了同比增长。【原文：Adidas on Tuesday said it saw strong underlying growth in Greater China in the third quarter, while sales in North America excluding the Yeezy collection were up on the year on increasing brand momentum.】

item.title: 汉莎航空第三季度利润下降 9%，核心品牌陷入困境
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）周二报告称，由于其旗舰航空公司汉莎航空（Lufthansa）在低收益率、与国际航空公司的竞争以及成本飙升等问题上举步维艰，该公司第三季度的营业利润同比下降。【原文：German airline group Lufthansa on Tuesday reported a year-on-year fall in its operating profit in the third quarter, as its flagship carrier Lufthansa struggles with low yields, competition with international airlines and spiralling costs.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行第三季度净利润与 2023 年同期相比增长 12
item.description: 西班牙桑坦德银行（Santander）周二表示，得益于零售业务的稳健表现，其第三季度净利润与 2023 年同期相比增长了 12%。【原文：Spain's Santander said on Tuesday its net profit in the third quarter rose 12% compared to the same period in 2023 thanks to its retail business' solid performance.】

item.title: 苹果供应商 TDK 与迈凯轮车队合作推动电动汽车发展
item.description: 苹果供应商 TDK 已与迈凯轮车队在电动方程式 E 赛车中建立合作伙伴关系，这家日本零部件制造商的目标是在电动汽车领域实现扩张。【原文：Apple supplier TDK has partnered with McLaren Racing in Formula E electric motor racing as the Japanese components manufacturer targets expansion in the electric vehicle sector.】

item.title: TikTok 所有者字节跳动创始人跃居中国富豪榜榜首
item.description: 本周二公布的年度富豪榜显示，字节跳动创始人张一鸣以 493 亿美元的个人财富成为中国首富，尽管房地产和可再生能源领域的同行表现不佳。【原文：ByteDance founder Zhang Yiming is China's richest person, with personal wealth of $49.3 billion, an annual rich list showed on Tuesday, although counterparts in real estate and renewables have fared less well.】

item.title: 早间竞价：风险焦点转向盈利雪崩
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 汇丰银行第三季度利润增长 10%，启动 30 亿美元回购计划
item.description: 周二，汇丰控股公布第三季度利润增长 10%，超过分析师预期，原因是其财富和批发银行业务受益于降息速度低于预期，同时汇丰正着手进行其历史上最大规模的改革之一。【原文：HSBC Holdings posted a 10% rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, beating analyst estimates, as its wealth and wholesale banking benefited from slower-than-expected rate cuts while it embarks on one of the largest overhauls in its history.】

item.title: 亚洲股市涨跌不一，美元在大盘股盈利和就业数据公布前漂移
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市在震荡交投中涨跌不一，投资者正在为华尔街为期三天的科技巨头财报做准备。【原文：Asian stocks were mixed in volatile trading on Tuesday as investors girded for three days of tech megacap earnings reports on Wall Street, kicking off with Google parent Alphabet later in the day.】

item.title: 日元受困于政治不确定性；美元期待关键数据发布
item.description: 日元周二在三个月低点附近徘徊，原因是日本执政联盟在周末的选举中失去了议会多数席位，这增加了日本政治和货币前景的不确定性。【原文：The yen languished near a three-month trough on Tuesday as the loss of a parliamentary majority for Japan's ruling coalition in weekend elections raised uncertainty about the nation's political and monetary outlook.】

item.title: 油价上扬，美国补充储备计划提供支撑
item.description: 由于美国为战略石油储备购买石油的计划提供了支撑，同时投资者仍在关注中东局势的发展，油价在前一交易日大幅下挫后于周二有所回升。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Tuesday, after a sharp plunge in the previous session, as a U.S. plan to purchase oil for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve provided support while investors remained focused on developments in the Middle East.】

item.title: 巴西研究所就未成年人过度使用社交媒体问题起诉社交媒体巨头，索赔 5.25 亿美元
item.description: 根据路透社看到的初步诉状，巴西集体防卫研究所已提起两起诉讼，要求 TikTok、Kwai 和 Meta Platforms 的巴西分公司赔偿 30 亿雷亚尔（约合 5.2527 亿美元），因为它们被指控未能建立防止未成年人滥用这些社交媒体平台的机制。【原文：Brazil's Collective Defense Institute has filed two lawsuits demanding 3 billion reais ($525.27 million) from the Brazilian units of TikTok, Kwai and Meta Platforms for allegedly failing to create mechanisms to prevent indiscriminate use of these social media platforms by minors, according to initial petitions seen by Reuters.】

item.title: Polestar 称拜登的提案将 "有效禁止 "其汽车在美国销售
item.description: Polestar 周一表示，拜登政府提出的禁止使用中国汽车硬件和软件的规定将 "有效禁止 "该汽车制造商在美国销售汽车，包括美国制造的汽车。【原文：Polestar said on Monday that a proposed Biden administration rule to bar the use of Chinese vehicle hardware and software would "effectively prohibit" the automaker from selling vehicles in the United States, including cars made in the U.S.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构承诺在特朗普威胁和政治压力下继续前进
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）周一表示，在11月5日总统大选临近之际，共和党和民主党的知名人士威胁要解雇他，并要求将他解职，但他仍将继续保护投资者的工作。【原文：Gary Gensler, chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, said on Monday that he would continue his work to protect investors after threats of firing and calls for his dismissal from prominent Republicans and Democrats as the Nov. 5 presidential election approaches.】

item.title: 媒体报道：韩国央行董事会成员称美元流动性无忧
item.description: 据韩联社周二报道，韩国央行一位有投票权的董事会成员表示，她并不担心美元赢家市场的美元流动性状况。【原文：A voting board member at South Korea's central bank said she is not concerned about dollar liquidity conditions in the dollar-won market, Yonhap news agency reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：不确定性深重，投资者寻求更明确的信号
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: NextEra 计划筹资 15 亿美元资助能源项目
item.description: 公用事业公司 NextEra Energy 周一表示，该公司打算通过出售股权单位筹集 15 亿美元，用于资助新项目。【原文：Utility firm NextEra Energy said on Monday it intends to raise $1.5 billion through the sale of equity units to fund new projects.】

item.title: 芯片设计商需求强劲，Cadence上调2024年利润预期中点
item.description: 凯登斯设计系统公司（Cadence Design Systems）周一上调了年度利润预期的中点，押注于生成式人工智能的蓬勃发展将推动对其用于设计为这些系统提供动力的复杂芯片的软件的需求，从而使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 6.4%。【原文：Cadence Design Systems raised the midpoint of its annual profit forecast on Monday, betting on the boom in generative AI to drive demand for its software used to design complex chips that power those systems, sending its shares up 6.4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 美国最终确定遏制对华人工智能投资的规则，并实施其他限制措施
item.description: 拜登政府周一表示，它正在敲定限制美国在中国人工智能和其他可能威胁美国国家安全的技术领域投资的规则。【原文：The Biden administration said on Monday it is finalizing rules that will limit U.S. investments in artificial intelligence and other technology sectors in China that could threaten U.S. national security.】

item.title: Vans 母公司 VF Corp 实现盈利，第二季度销售额超出预期；股价上涨 16
item.description: Vans 母公司 VF Corp 在连续两个季度亏损后扭亏为盈，周一的第二季度销售额超出预期，这得益于其直接面向消费者业务的连续改善和库存的精简，使其股价在收盘后上涨了约 16%。【原文：Vans parent VF Corp turned a profit after two consecutive quarterly losses and beat second-quarter sales estimates on Monday, benefiting from sequential improvement in its direct-to-consumer business and leaner inventory, sending its shares up about 16% after the bell.】

item.title: 西南航空公司必须面对飞行员工会就恐吓和纪律威胁提起的诉讼
item.description: 西南航空公司周一被联邦上诉法院勒令面对其飞行员工会的诉讼，该工会指控该航空公司违反联邦法律，恐吓和惩戒加入该工会的飞行员。【原文：Southwest Airlines was ordered by a federal appeals court on Monday to face a lawsuit by its pilots union, which accused the carrier of violating federal law by intimidating and disciplining pilots for affiliating with it.】

item.title: 汽车制造商福特季度利润超预期，但下调业绩展望
item.description: 福特汽车公司周一公布的第三季度盈利超出华尔街预期，但该公司表示，预计全年息税前盈利将仅达到指导目标的下限。【原文：Ford Motor beat Wall Street's expectations for third-quarter earnings on Monday, but said it expects to meet just the lower end of its full-year guidance for earnings before interest and taxes.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，丰田和 NTT 将投资 33 亿美元研发人工智能自动驾驶汽车
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，丰田汽车和日本电信电话公司将投资 5000 亿日元（约合 32.6 亿美元）用于研发人工智能软件，以改进自动驾驶技术。【原文：Toyota Motor and Japan's Nippon Telegraph and Telephone will be investing 500 billion yen ($3.26 billion) in research and development to create artificial intelligence software to improve self-driving, Nikkei reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通就与病毒式传播故障有关的支票欺诈起诉客户
item.description: 美国最大的银行摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）已开始起诉客户的支票欺诈行为，称他们非法利用在 TikTok 上疯传的临时技术故障不当提取资金。【原文：JPMorgan Chase , the largest U.S. bank, has begun suing customers for check fraud, saying they improperly withdrew funds by taking illegal advantage of a temporary technical glitch that went viral on TikTok.】

item.title: 沃尔玛在节假日前将 Walmart Plus 套餐价格降低一半
item.description: 沃尔玛（Walmart）周一表示，将在节假日来临之前以五折的价格提供会员服务 "Walmart Plus"，该零售商正试图缩小与竞争对手亚马逊（Amazon.com）的 Prime 订阅服务之间的差距。【原文：Walmart said on Monday it would offer its membership service, Walmart Plus, at a 50% discount ahead of the holiday season, as the retailer attempts to close the gap with rival Amazon.com's Prime subscription service.】
